mapper.sql: logid, trade_day, corp_id, corp_name, pay_id, pay_channel, fee_sum, currency, trade_number, trade_time, trade_sum, order_id, site_id, site_name, pay_state, cur_state, state_time, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM as_pay_payment_info WHERE 1=1 AND order_id = #{order_id} AND cur_state = #{cur_state} AND trade_day = #{trade_day} ORDER BY trade_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_pay_payment_info( logid, trade_day, corp_id, corp_name, pay_id, pay_channel, fee_sum, currency, trade_number, trade_time, trade_sum, order_id, site_id, site_name, pay_state, cur_state, state_time, create_time ) VALUES( #{logid}, #{trade_day}, #{corp_id}, #{corp_name}, #{pay_id}, #{pay_channel}, #{fee_sum}, #{currency}, #{trade_number}, #{trade_time}, #{trade_sum}, #{order_id}, #{site_id}, #{site_name}, #{pay_state}, #{cur_state}, #{state_time}, #{create_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE as_pay_payment_info SET logid = #{logid}, trade_day = #{trade_day}, corp_id = #{corp_id}, corp_name = #{corp_name}, pay_id = #{pay_id}, pay_channel = #{pay_channel}, fee_sum = #{fee_sum}, currency = #{currency}, trade_number = #{trade_number}, trade_time = #{trade_time}, trade_sum = #{trade_sum}, order_id = #{order_id}, site_id = #{site_id}, site_name = #{site_name}, pay_state = #{pay_state}, cur_state = #{cur_state}, state_time = #{state_time}, create_time = #{create_time} WHERE logid = #{logid}
